name: EVERTOWER (Lil Cage)
description:
Welcome to our new release of our post-jam update on pc! (Please keep in mind that this is a back-port of the mobile version, as such some features may be weird until we entirely update the version outside of the main branch)

Soar through multiple new modes and a multitude of new features compared to the classic release!

Compete with your friends for the highest scores or push to achieve the highest number of crowns in the new story mode! complete with battle bosses and two higher difficulties modes!

This game is still in active development! it will keep receiving at least one update per week and a lot, a LOT of UI and balancing elements will change overtime! please if you are interested in the project keep peeking in every so often or subscribe to the dev log!

  • Defeat all new powerful bosses and complete the story mode!
  • Each island has it's own boss to defeat and unique stories to uncover! (stories and collectibles still in progress)
  • All-Customizable Color palette to make the experience entirely yours!
  • Buy all new powerful weapon instead of the old upgrade system!
  • you can equip up to three weapons between 20 (more coming overtime!) different weapons!

(Also hats.)

(The controls shown here are for the free mobile version!)

You can also still play the original game jam version at:
https://lilcage.itch.io/evertower-classic 

(If you eventually wish to change to the supporter version all your progress and stats and achievements should be cross-compatible between the two versions and should automatically carry over without any messing with files required!)
